description: The main landing page of the shopping website where users can view featured products, explore the latest deals, and navigate to other sections. This page serves as the gateway to various categories and promotional offers, ensuring users have a seamless shopping experience.
practice_features: Search bar, Featured products section, User account management, Real-time notifications for deals and promotions.
additional_features: Newsletter subscription, Social media links, Personalized product recommendations, Live chat support, Seasonal banners and promotional pop-ups.

description: A page displaying a comprehensive list of products available for purchase. The page provides various options for users to filter, sort, and navigate through the products. Users can see product details, add products to their cart, and manage their wishlist.
practice_features: Product filtering, Pagination, Interactive product sorting options
additional_features: Product sorting by price and rating, Wishlist management, Real-time product availability status, User reviews and ratings display

description: A comprehensive page displaying the details of a specific product. This page provides users with essential information about the product, including high-quality images, detailed descriptions, pricing, availability, and customer reviews. It also includes options for users to add the product to their cart or wishlist.
practice_features: Product images, Product description, Reviews, Price display, Availability status
additional_features: Related products section, Add to wishlist, Social media sharing, Customer Q&A

description: A comprehensive page displaying the user's shopping cart with the ability to review, modify, and manage items before proceeding to checkout. Users can update item quantities, remove items, and apply discount codes. The page provides a clear summary of the estimated total cost, including taxes and shipping fees.
practice_features: Cart item list, Quantity adjustment, Remove item button, Real-time cart updates, Display of individual item prices and total cost.
additional_features: Apply discount code, Estimated total including taxes and shipping, Save items for later, Suggested items based on cart contents, Promotional banners and messages.

description: A comprehensive page for users to complete their purchase by providing payment and shipping information. This page ensures a smooth and secure transaction process, allowing users to review their order before finalizing the purchase.
practice_features: Payment form, Shipping information form, Order summary, Discount code application, Save order for later, Review order items and details
additional_features: Save for later, Apply gift card, Real-time validation of payment information, Auto-fill address using saved profiles, Estimated delivery date display, Multiple payment options (credit card, PayPal, etc.)

description: A page confirming the user's order, displaying detailed order information, including itemized list of purchased products, their prices, shipping address, and estimated delivery date. Users can review their order, print the confirmation, and get information on how to track their shipment.
practice_features: Order details display, Estimated delivery date, Print order functionality, Track order option
additional_features: Order review section, Shipping address confirmation, Links to customer support, Suggested products based on the current order

description: A page for users to sign in to their accounts. The page includes a user-friendly login form with fields for email and password, ensuring secure access. Users can also navigate to account creation or password recovery if needed.
practice_features: Login form with email and password fields, client-side validation, secure submission.
additional_features: Forgot password link, Social media login options (Google, Facebook), Remember me checkbox, Captcha for security.

description: A comprehensive page for new users to create an account. The page includes a user-friendly registration form, ensuring a smooth sign-up process. It also features security measures such as email verification and a Terms and Conditions agreement.
practice_features: Registration form with fields for username, password, email, and phone number. The form includes validation to ensure the accuracy of the data entered.
additional_features: Terms and Conditions checkbox, Email verification, Password strength indicator, Captcha verification to prevent spam, Tooltips for additional guidance, Responsive design for optimal viewing on various devices.

description: A page providing contact information and a contact form for users to reach out. This page ensures users can easily get in touch with the company for support, inquiries, or feedback. It includes various methods of communication such as email, phone, and a live chat option.
practice_features: Contact form with validation, Real-time form submission, Contact information with clickable email and phone links.
additional_features: Google Maps integration showing the company's location, Live chat for immediate assistance, Office hours, and an embedded FAQ section for quick answers to common questions.
